game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where memories can be transferred from one person to another, the fabric of reality is threatened by a mysterious force known as 'The Devourer'. This entity feeds on memories, erasing entire cities and civilizations from existence. Players take on the role of an amnesiac Memory Hunter, tasked with uncovering their own past while racing against time to stop The Devourer and restore the lost memories of humanity.
game.beginning: The game begins with the protagonist waking up in a desolate, abandoned city with no recollection of who they are or how they got there. As they explore the ruins, they stumble upon a cryptic message from an unknown sender, hinting at their true identity and purpose.
game.ending: After traversing through treacherous landscapes and piecing together fragmented memories, the protagonist finally confronts The Devourer in an epic showdown. With the fate of humanity hanging in the balance, the player must make a choice: sacrifice their own memories to save the world or risk everything to restore their own identity.
